_comment: Quick-reference MCP snippets for openapi-search by AI assistant
claude_code_cli: claude mcp add --scope user openapi-search --transport http https://openapi-mcp.openapisearch.com/mcp

getApiOverview.description: Get a plain-language overview of all endpoints in an API

params.id: API identifier from openapisearch.com or raw OpenAPI URL

getApiOperation.description: Get full details for a specific API endpoint

params.id: Same API identifier as used in getApiOverview
params.operationIdOrRoute: Operation ID or route path (e.g. createPaymentIntent or /v1/payment_intents)
